text.section: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated.
"Check" has the meaning provided in § 3-104(f) of this article.
"Dishonor" has the meaning provided in § 3-502 of this article.
"Drawer" has the meaning provided in § 3-103(a)(3) of this article.
"Holder" has the meaning provided in § 1-201(20) of this article.
"Holder in due course" has the meaning provided in § 3-302 of this article.
"Instrument" has the meaning provided in § 3-104(b) of this article.
"Issue" has the meaning provided in § 3-105 of this article.
"Maker" has the meaning provided in § 3-103(a)(5) of this article.
"Negotiation" has the meaning provided in § 3-201 of this article.
"Notice of dishonor" has the meaning provided in § 3-503 of this article.
"Stop payment order" has the meaning provided in § 4-403 of this article.
